salad.basics.title: 🌱 Basic Salad Making
salad.basics.description: In Grow a Garden, salad making is one of the core gameplay mechanics. By growing various vegetables and fruits, you can create different levels of salads to earn rewards.
salad.basics.step1Desc: Plant basic vegetables like lettuce, tomatoes, carrots in your garden
salad.basics.step2Desc: Regularly water your plants to ensure healthy growth
salad.basics.step3Desc: Wait for plants to fully mature before harvesting
salad.basics.step4Desc: Put collected ingredients into the salad maker
salad.basics.step5Desc: Complete salad making to earn game currency and experience
salad.basics.proTip: 💡 Pro Tip: Watering during golden hours (7:00-9:00 in-game) provides double effects, greatly increasing plant growth speed!

salad.faq.title: ❓ Frequently Asked Questions
salad.faq.coins.q: Q: How to quickly earn more coins?
salad.faq.coins.a: A: Making advanced salads is the best way to earn coins. We recommend planting high-value ingredients like avocados and strawberries to make luxury salad recipes.
salad.faq.growth.q: Q: Why are my plants growing slowly?
salad.faq.growth.a: A: Ensure regular watering, especially during golden hours (7:00-9:00) for best effects. Using better watering tools can also improve efficiency.
salad.faq.rare.q: Q: Where to get rare ingredients?
salad.faq.rare.a: A: Rare ingredients are mainly obtained through game events, special events, or advanced seed packs. Follow game announcements and participate in events promptly.
salad.faq.highest.q: Q: How to make the highest level salads?
salad.faq.highest.a: A: Need to collect various rare ingredients like mushrooms, chili peppers, mangoes, etc. We recommend first establishing stable basic ingredient supply, then gradually collecting rare ingredients.
salad.faq.fail.q: Q: What if salad making fails?
salad.faq.fail.a: A: Check if ingredients are fresh enough, ensure recipe is correct. Some advanced recipes require specific amounts of ingredients, please verify carefully.
salad.faq.cooperate.q: Q: How to cooperate with other players?
salad.faq.cooperate.a: A: Join Discord communities to exchange experience with other players and trade ingredients. Team cooperation can greatly improve efficiency.

wheatGrowing.overview.description: Growing wheat in Grow a Garden is one of the most fundamental and profitable farming activities. Wheat is the base ingredient for many recipes and is always in high demand for bread making and other culinary uses.

wheatGrowing.stepByStep.step4.tillering: Tillering Stage: Watch for side shoot development
wheatGrowing.stepByStep.step4.stem: Stem Extension: Monitor height and stem development

farmingBasics.faq.title: ❓ Frequently Asked Questions
farmingBasics.faq.bestTime.question: Q: What's the best time to plant crops?
farmingBasics.faq.bestTime.answer: A: Plant during the morning hours (7:00-9:00 in-game time) for optimal growth and use golden hours for watering.
farmingBasics.faq.soilType.question: Q: How do I choose the right soil type?
farmingBasics.faq.soilType.answer: A: Match soil type to your crop needs - basic soil for beginners, premium soil for high-value crops, and magic soil for rare crops.
farmingBasics.faq.profitableStrategy.que: Q: What's the most profitable farming strategy?
farmingBasics.faq.profitableStrategy.ans: A: Focus on high-value crops during peak demand times, use premium soil, and maintain consistent watering schedules.
farmingBasics.faq.wateringFrequency.ques: Q: How often should I water my crops?
farmingBasics.faq.wateringFrequency.answ: A: Water when soil is dry, typically every 2-3 hours, and always during golden hours for double effects.
farmingBasics.faq.harvestTime.question: Q: When is the best time to harvest?
farmingBasics.faq.harvestTime.answer: A: Harvest at peak ripeness (100% growth) for maximum value and quality.
farmingBasics.faq.increaseEfficiency.que: Q: How can I increase my farming efficiency?
farmingBasics.faq.increaseEfficiency.ans: A: Use automated systems, plan your crop rotation, invest in better tools, and focus on crops you excel at growing.

seedSelection.faq.title: ❓ Frequently Asked Questions
seedSelection.faq.q1: Q: What's the best seed for beginners?
seedSelection.faq.a1: A: Start with fast-growing seeds like Basil or Lettuce that have short growth times and low risk.
seedSelection.faq.q2: Q: How do I know which seeds are most profitable?
seedSelection.faq.a2: A: Calculate profit per hour (market value ÷ growth time) and focus on seeds with the highest ratios.
seedSelection.faq.q3: Q: Should I focus on one type of seed or diversify?
seedSelection.faq.a3: A: Diversify your seed selection to reduce risk and maintain steady income from different sources.
seedSelection.faq.q4: Q: How do I choose seeds for different seasons?
seedSelection.faq.a4: A: Research which seeds perform best in different seasons and adjust your selection accordingly.
seedSelection.faq.q5: Q: What's the best strategy for maximizing profits?
seedSelection.faq.a5: A: Combine fast-growing seeds for steady income with high-value seeds for premium profits.
seedSelection.faq.q6: Q: How can I improve my seed selection skills?
seedSelection.faq.a6: A: Track your seed performance, study market trends, and gradually experiment with more challenging seeds.

cropRotation.faq.title: ❓ Frequently Asked Questions
cropRotation.faq.q1.question: Q: How long should a crop rotation cycle be?
cropRotation.faq.q1.answer: A: Most effective rotations are 3-4 years long, allowing enough time for soil recovery and disease prevention.
cropRotation.faq.q2.question: Q: Can I rotate crops in small plots?
cropRotation.faq.q2.answer: A: Yes, even small plots benefit from rotation. Focus on crop families rather than specific crops.
cropRotation.faq.q3.question: Q: What's the best crop to start a rotation with?
cropRotation.faq.q3.answer: A: Legumes are excellent starter crops as they add nitrogen to the soil for subsequent crops.
cropRotation.faq.q4.question: Q: How do I know if my rotation is working?
cropRotation.faq.q4.answer: A: Monitor soil fertility, crop yields, and disease incidence. Improving trends indicate success.
cropRotation.faq.q5.question: Q: Can I change my rotation plan mid-season?
cropRotation.faq.q5.answer: A: While possible, it's better to stick to your plan and make adjustments for the next cycle.
cropRotation.faq.q6.question: Q: How does rotation affect profits?
cropRotation.faq.q6.answer: A: Proper rotation typically increases yields and crop quality, leading to higher profits over time.

farmingBasics.faq.title: ❓ Frequently Asked Questions
farmingBasics.faq.bestTime.question: Q: What's the best time to plant crops?
farmingBasics.faq.bestTime.answer: A: Plant during the morning hours (7:00-9:00 in-game time) for optimal growth and use golden hours for watering.
farmingBasics.faq.soilType.question: Q: How do I choose the right soil type?
farmingBasics.faq.soilType.answer: A: Match soil type to your crop needs - basic soil for beginners, premium soil for high-value crops, and magic soil for rare crops.
farmingBasics.faq.profitableStrategy.que: Q: What's the most profitable farming strategy?
farmingBasics.faq.profitableStrategy.ans: A: Focus on high-value crops during peak demand times, use premium soil, and maintain consistent watering schedules.
farmingBasics.faq.wateringFrequency.ques: Q: How often should I water my crops?
farmingBasics.faq.wateringFrequency.answ: A: Water when soil is dry, typically every 2-3 hours, and always during golden hours for double effects.
farmingBasics.faq.harvestTime.question: Q: When is the best time to harvest?
farmingBasics.faq.harvestTime.answer: A: Harvest at peak ripeness (100% growth) for maximum value and quality.
farmingBasics.faq.increaseEfficiency.que: Q: How can I increase my farming efficiency?
farmingBasics.faq.increaseEfficiency.ans: A: Use automated systems, plan your crop rotation, invest in better tools, and focus on crops you excel at growing.

howToGrowWheat.faq.title: ❓ Frequently Asked Questions
howToGrowWheat.faq.q1.question: Q: How long does it take for wheat to grow?
howToGrowWheat.faq.q1.answer: A: Wheat takes exactly 45 minutes to reach full maturity from planting to harvest.
howToGrowWheat.faq.q2.question: Q: How much wheat can I harvest from one plant?
howToGrowWheat.faq.q2.answer: A: Each wheat plant typically yields 1-2 wheat grains, depending on growing conditions and care.
howToGrowWheat.faq.q3.question: Q: What's the best time to plant wheat?
howToGrowWheat.faq.q3.answer: A: Plant wheat during golden hours (7:00-9:00 AM) for the fastest growth and best yields.
howToGrowWheat.faq.q4.question: Q: How much profit can I make from wheat farming?
howToGrowWheat.faq.q4.answer: A: Wheat typically sells for 50-100 coins per grain. With efficient farming, you can earn 500-1000 coins per harvest cycle.
howToGrowWheat.faq.q5.question: Q: Should I sell wheat raw or process it into flour?
howToGrowWheat.faq.q5.answer: A: Process wheat into flour for 3-4x the profit. Flour sells for much more than raw wheat.
howToGrowWheat.faq.q6.question: Q: How do I prevent wheat from dying?
howToGrowWheat.faq.q6.answer: A: Water regularly, avoid overwatering, plant in good soil, and harvest on time. Don't let wheat sit too long after maturity.

seedSelection.faq.q1.answer: A: Start with fast-growing seeds like Basil or Lettuce that have short growth times and low risk.
seedSelection.faq.q2.question: Q: How do I know which seeds are most profitable?
seedSelection.faq.q2.answer: A: Calculate profit per hour (market value ÷ growth time) and focus on seeds with the highest ratios.
seedSelection.faq.q3.question: Q: Should I focus on one type of seed or diversify?
seedSelection.faq.q3.answer: A: Diversify your seed selection to reduce risk and maintain steady income from different sources.
seedSelection.faq.q4.question: Q: How do I choose seeds for different seasons?
seedSelection.faq.q4.answer: A: Research which seeds perform best in different seasons and adjust your selection accordingly.
seedSelection.faq.q5.question: Q: What's the best strategy for maximizing profits?
seedSelection.faq.q5.answer: A: Combine fast-growing seeds for steady income with high-value seeds for premium profits.
seedSelection.faq.q6.question: Q: How can I improve my seed selection skills?
seedSelection.faq.q6.answer: A: Track your seed performance, study market trends, and gradually experiment with more challenging seeds.

cropRotation.faq.title: ❓ Frequently Asked Questions
cropRotation.faq.q1.question: Q: How long should a crop rotation cycle be?
cropRotation.faq.q1.answer: A: Most effective rotations are 3-4 years long, allowing enough time for soil recovery and disease prevention.
cropRotation.faq.q2.question: Q: Can I rotate crops in small plots?
cropRotation.faq.q2.answer: A: Yes, even small plots benefit from rotation. Focus on crop families rather than specific crops.
cropRotation.faq.q3.question: Q: What's the best crop to start a rotation with?
cropRotation.faq.q3.answer: A: Legumes are excellent starter crops as they add nitrogen to the soil for subsequent crops.
cropRotation.faq.q4.question: Q: How do I know if my rotation is working?
cropRotation.faq.q4.answer: A: Monitor soil fertility, crop yields, and disease incidence. Improving trends indicate success.
cropRotation.faq.q5.question: Q: Can I change my rotation plan mid-season?
cropRotation.faq.q5.answer: A: While possible, it's better to stick to your plan and make adjustments for the next cycle.
cropRotation.faq.q6.question: Q: How does rotation affect profits?
cropRotation.faq.q6.answer: A: Proper rotation typically increases yields and crop quality, leading to higher profits over time.

farmingBasics.faq.title: ❓ Frequently Asked Questions
farmingBasics.faq.bestTime.question: Q: What's the best time to plant crops?
farmingBasics.faq.bestTime.answer: A: Plant during the morning hours (7:00-9:00 in-game time) for optimal growth and use golden hours for watering.
farmingBasics.faq.soilType.question: Q: How do I choose the right soil type?
farmingBasics.faq.soilType.answer: A: Match soil type to your crop needs - basic soil for beginners, premium soil for high-value crops, and magic soil for rare crops.
farmingBasics.faq.profitableStrategy.que: Q: What's the most profitable farming strategy?
farmingBasics.faq.profitableStrategy.ans: A: Focus on high-value crops during peak demand times, use premium soil, and maintain consistent watering schedules.
farmingBasics.faq.wateringFrequency.ques: Q: How often should I water my crops?
farmingBasics.faq.wateringFrequency.answ: A: Water when soil is dry, typically every 2-3 hours, and always during golden hours for double effects.
farmingBasics.faq.harvestTime.question: Q: When is the best time to harvest?
farmingBasics.faq.harvestTime.answer: A: Harvest at peak ripeness (100% growth) for maximum value and quality.
farmingBasics.faq.increaseEfficiency.que: Q: How can I increase my farming efficiency?
farmingBasics.faq.increaseEfficiency.ans: A: Use automated systems, plan your crop rotation, invest in better tools, and focus on crops you excel at growing.
